name: astro-x-shadcn-minimal-theme
title: Astro x Shadcn Minimal Theme
desc: A simple theme that comes with shadcn, tailwindcss & react preinstalled and configured.
article:
This theme comes with everything installed and configured so you can start installing and using shadcn components right out of the gate!


It also comes with an abstracted shadcn Avatar component that will help you abstract further interactive Shadcn components to use with Astro.

github.name: astro-shadcn-starter
github.description: An Astro project with shadcn configured and ready to go out of the box.
